problem.title: Healthcare System's 10 Major Fundamental Inefficiencies
problem.subtitle: SacreLife eliminates communication, tracking, and management problems at the system's core that both patients and doctors face daily with artificial intelligence.

1.title: Communication Gap and Information Confusion
1.description: Patients don't understand medical terms used by doctors; they can't fully grasp the treatment process, leading to trust issues.
1.solution: AI explains every medical term in simple, understandable language. Patients clearly understand what they're experiencing and what they need to do.

2.title: Late Intervention and Preventable Complications
2.description: Chronic values like blood pressure and glucose aren't regularly monitored by patients, so they're not noticed until reaching dangerous levels.
2.solution: AI continuously analyzes data and uses an 'early warning' system to notify both patients and doctors of risky situations, activating preventive healthcare.

3.title: Forgetting or Irregular Medication Use
3.description: Patients forget to take medications on time, reducing treatment effectiveness, and doctors are unaware of this situation.
3.solution: Smart reminders are sent, patients mark 'taken' in the app. Doctors can see usage history in real-time to optimize treatment.

4.title: Waiting Times and Appointment Chaos
4.description: Patients arrive early at hospitals, wait long periods, and spend time inefficiently. This reduces patient satisfaction.
4.solution: AI shows patients the live number of waiting people and estimated waiting time. Patients plan their time efficiently.

5.title: Lack of Patient-Specific Treatment Information
5.description: Patients can't access sufficient and reliable information about their illness and how to live with it, getting lost in internet misinformation.
5.solution: AI provides verified and personalized educational content (articles, videos, guides) specific to patients' chronic conditions.

6.title: Pre-Appointment Unpreparedness
6.description: Doctors start meetings without knowing the patient; valuable examination time is spent learning the patient's history, prolonging the process.
6.solution: Patients answer brief questions before appointments, this information is forwarded to doctors. Examinations become more prepared, faster, and efficient.

7.title: Inability to Monitor Relatives' Health Status
7.description: Health status of elderly or child individuals (medication use, appointments) cannot be effectively monitored remotely by family members.
7.solution: The app allows monitoring of relatives' health processes. Works like a 'digital guardian angel' providing family-wide security.

8.title: Doctors' Communication Burden and Burnout
8.description: Doctors can't keep up with one-on-one communication with every patient and repeating standard information in busy patient flow.
8.solution: Doctors define standard messages they want AI to communicate to patients; the system automatically conveys this, reducing the doctor's burden.

9.title: Material and Stock Shortages
9.description: Medications or consumables in clinics can run out unplanned, causing service disruptions.
9.solution: AI monitors stock usage, provides automatic warnings and supply recommendations for depleting products, increasing clinic operational efficiency.

10.title: Unreachable Feedback
10.description: Patient satisfaction or complaints often don't reach doctors, which is an obstacle to improving service quality.
10.solution: AI measures patient satisfaction after examinations or surgeries, conveys problems to doctors, and initiates follow-up processes when necessary.

features.title: End-to-End Smart Health Ecosystem
features.subtitle: SacreLife offers a comprehensive, AI-powered solution that facilitates every step of the patient and doctor journey.

1.title: Smart Emergency Response System
1.description: AI monitors critical health data and instantly notifies doctors, emergency services, or relatives with one touch when abnormalities occur.

2.title: AI-Powered Content and Video Generation
2.description: Doctors can create article and video ideas in seconds with AI, automate their social media posts.

3.title: Single Point Access to All Health Documents
3.description: Securely access all your lab results, X-rays, and reports from one place. Easily upload your past documents to the system.

4.title: AI-Powered Two-Stage Analysis
4.description: Doctors get a second opinion by having AI interpret lab results. Details that might be missed are caught, diagnostic reliability increases.

5.title: Remote E-Prescription Sharing
5.description: Get your e-prescription instantly after online consultation with your doctor, renew your medications without going to the hospital.

6.title: Smart Medication Tracking and Feedback
6.description: Get reminders at medication times, share your usage pattern with your doctor. Let your treatment response be monitored instantly.

7.title: AI-Powered Automatic Appointment Scheduling
7.description: Doctors define weekly appointment quotas and time slots, AI automatically fills the calendar most efficiently.

8.title: AI-Powered Consultation
8.description: Patients can ask AI questions about their health conditions to get preliminary information and guidance. Final decision always rests with the doctor.

9.title: Doctor-Approved AI Communication
9.description: Doctors define standard information to be communicated to patients in AI. AI conveys this information to patients only with doctor approval, speeding up communication.

10.title: Post-Surgery and Examination Satisfaction Tracking
10.description: AI calls patients after operations to measure their satisfaction, notes complaints, and immediately conveys feedback to doctors.

11.title: Verified Doctor Rating and Feedback
11.description: Only patients who have received service can rate doctors. This creates a fair and reliable evaluation system.

12.title: AI Information for Chronic Patients
12.description: Disease management awareness is increased by providing personalized videos, articles, and guides for chronic diseases like diabetes and hypertension.

13.title: Personalized AI Health Coaching
13.description: Offers personalized nutrition, exercise, and lifestyle recommendations based on age, medical history, and lifestyle. Motivates you on your healthy living journey.

14.title: Voice and Video Tracking & Remote Examination
14.description: Conduct secure and high-quality voice or video consultations with your doctor through the platform.

15.title: Stock Tracking and Consumption Management
15.description: Medications and consumables in the clinic are monitored by AI. When stock decreases, the system automatically provides warnings and supply recommendations.

16.title: Insurance Compatibility and Payment Information
16.description: Before making an appointment, learn whether the doctor or treatment you choose is covered by your insurance, avoid surprise payments.

17.title: Psychology Chatbot (Private and Anonymous)
17.description: Anonymous support that's with you 24/7 during stress, anxiety, or depression, understands you, and refers you to specialists when needed.

18.title: AI-Based Early Warning System
18.description: Detects risky trends in your health data (e.g., last 3 blood pressure readings increasing) and warns you and your doctor before potential complications occur.

19.title: Smart Assistant with Live Appointment Tracking
19.description: Patient sees live how many people are ahead and estimated waiting time. Waiting room chaos ends.

20.title: Patient Pre-Information and Guidance
20.description: Patient answers a few simple questions about their complaints before appointment. Doctor starts examination knowing the patient.

21.title: Emergency Information and Security
21.description: Add critical information like allergies, blood type, organ donation status. In an emergency, this information can save your life.

22.title: AI-Powered Medical Term Explanations
22.description: Didn't understand a term your doctor used? Touch it, let AI explain it to you in simple and understandable language.

23.title: Family Health Tracking (Digital Guardian Angel)
23.description: Track your children's or elderly parents' health processes, medication intake, and appointments from one place.
